name: ELE BLAZE
description: Fighting, dodge bullets and traps, ELE BLAZE is transverse scrolling game of ACT, The girl - Nono have powerful ELE energy battling with enemies and stop chaos spreads, save the universe.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 155 MB available space Additional Notes: Win64 system
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
